p:
The JEV isolate we obtained from Thailand, JEV/sw/Thailand/185/2017, was GIb and clustered with other JEV isolates detected in Thailand during 1985â€“2005 (
11 ), as well as isolates from Myanmar in 2010, Cambodia in 2014 and 2015, and Singapore in 2014 ( Figure, panel B). Thus, these JEVs have been maintained in Thailand and other parts of the southern peninsula of continental Asia for >30 years.
